channel.title: How do you hold your Device in Auxy?
channel.description:
I’ve seen some people who hold their devices horizontally when they use Auxy, where the notes go from left to right, but I actually use it up and down. I’m wondering what everyone in the community does. [poll type=regular public=true] * Horizontally * Vertically [/poll]
Which one do you use and why is it better!?

item.title: How do you hold your Device in Auxy?
item.dc:creator: HXGN
item.description:
IDK why, but I can’t stand horizontal mode. It actually took me a while to figure out it existed, since I never bothered trying it, and I guess at that point, I just was too used to vertical.

Read full topic
item.source: How do you hold your Device in Auxy?

item.description:

item.title: How do you hold your Device in Auxy?
item.dc:creator: Zeph
item.description:

item.title: How do you hold your Device in Auxy?
item.dc:creator: Db909
item.description:
Was not a believer in the vertical piano roll when Auxy first did it. And there was a time where you couldn’t flip it. But I got to use to it and now realize that on the phone it means you can basically just use your thumb and sketch melodies one handed. So vertical all the time for me. But I’m sure it’d be different on an iPad

Read full topic
